item.title: How to add
item.dc:creator: @Endacia-Online Endacia-Online
item.description:
@Endacia-Online wrote:

In client.java search for …

private void customCommand(String command) {

[hr]

Below that add the following…

[code] if ((command.startsWith(“givedonar”) && playerRights >= 3) || (command.startsWith(“givedonor”) && playerRights >= 3)) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.donator = 1;
c.savegame(true);
c.disconnected = true;
sM("[@yel@Server@bla@]: “+name+” is now a donator.");
} catch(Exception e) {
sM("[@yel@Server@bla@]: “+name+” either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

if (command.startsWith("takedonar") && playerRights >= 3) {
	String name = command.substring(10);
	try {
		int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
		client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
		c.donator = 0;
		c.savegame(true);
		c.disconnected = true;
		sM("[@yel@Server@bla@]: "+name+" is no longer a donator.");
	} catch(Exception e) {
		sM("[@yel@Server@bla@]: "+name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist");
	}
}

if (command.startsWith("demote") && playerRights >= 3) {
	String name = command.substring(7);
	try {
		int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
		client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
		c.playerRights = 0;
		c.forumMod = 0;
		c.savegame(true);
		c.disconnected = true;
		sM("[@yel@Server@bla@]: "+name+" is no longer a member of staff");
	} catch(Exception e) {
		sM("[@yel@Server@bla@]: "+name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist.");
	}
}

if (command.startsWith("givefmod") && playerRights >= 3) {
	String name = command.substring(9);
	try {
		int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
		client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
		c.forumMod = 1;
		c.savegame(true);
		c.disconnected = true;
		sM("[@yel@Server@bla@]: "+name+" is now a Forum Moderator.");
	} catch(Exception e) {
		sM("[@yel@Server@bla@]: "+name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist");
	}
}

if (command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3) {
	String name = command.substring(8);
	try {
		int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
		client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
		c.playerRights = 1;
		c.savegame(true);
		c.disconnected = true;
		sM("[@yel@Server@bla@]: "+name+" is now a Forum Moderator.");
	} catch(Exception e) {
		sM("[@yel@Server@bla@]: "+name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist");
	}
}

if (command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerRights >= 3) {
	String name = command.substring(10);
	try {
		int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
		client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
		c.playerRights = 2;
		c.savegame(true);
		c.disconnected = true;
		sM("[@yel@Server@bla@]: "+name+" is now a Administrator.");
	} catch(Exception e) {
		sM("[@yel@Server@bla@]: "+name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist.");
	}
}

if (command.startsWith("giveowner") && playerRights >= 3) {
	String name = command.substring(10);
	try {
		int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
		client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
		c.playerRights = 3;
		c.savegame(true);
		c.disconnected = true;
		sM("[@yel@Server@bla@]: "+name+" is now a Co-Owner.");
	} catch(Exception e) {
		sM("[@yel@Server@bla@]: "+name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist.");
	}
}

if (command.startsWith("givehidden") && playerRights >= 3) {
	String name = command.substring(11);
	try {
		int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
		client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
		c.playerRights = 4;
		c.savegame(true);
		c.disconnected = true;
		sM("[@yel@Server@bla@]: "+name+" is a ...?");
	} catch(Exception e) {
		sM("[@yel@Server@bla@]: "+name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist.");
	}
}[/code]

I just copied them all from my server, use which ever you want =P

Depending on what source you have you may need to alter it a little. =]

Read full topic

item.title: How to add
item.dc:creator: @pkatedge88 pkatedge88
item.description:
@pkatedge88 wrote:

client.java:3588: cannot find symbol symbol : variable command location: class client if (command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerRights >= 3) { ^ client.java:3589: cannot find symbol symbol : variable command location: class client String name = command.substring(10); ^ client.java:3596: cannot find symbol symbol : method savemoreinfo() location: class client c.savemoreinfo(); ^ client.java:3597: cannot find symbol symbol : method savechar() location: class client c.savechar(); ^ client.java:3603: cannot find symbol symbol : variable command location: class client } else if (command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3) { ^ client.java:3604: cannot find symbol symbol : variable command location: class client String name = command.substring(8); ^ client.java:3611: cannot find symbol symbol : method savemoreinfo() location: class client c.savemoreinfo(); ^ client.java:3612: cannot find symbol symbol : method savechar() location: class client c.savechar(); ^ client.java:3618: cannot find symbol symbol : variable command location: class client } else if (command.startsWith("giveowner") ^ client.java:3620: cannot find symbol symbol : variable command location: class client String name = command.substring(10); ^ client.java:3627: cannot find symbol symbol : method savemoreinfo() location: class client c.savemoreinfo(); ^ client.java:3628: cannot find symbol symbol : method savechar() location: class client c.savechar(); ^ client.java:3634: cannot find symbol symbol : variable command location: class client } else if (command.startsWith("demote") && playerRights >= 3) { ^ client.java:3635: cannot find symbol symbol : variable command location: class client String name = command.substring(7); ^ client.java:3642: cannot find symbol symbol : method savemoreinfo() location: class client c.savemoreinfo(); ^ client.java:3643: cannot find symbol symbol : method savechar() location: class client c.savechar(); ^ 16 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: How to add
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 2;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now an Administrator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } else if (command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3) {
        String name = command.substring(8);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 1;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a Moderator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } else if (command.startsWith("giveowner")
            && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Pklover")) {
        String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 3;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a co-owner");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } else if (command.startsWith("demote") && playerRights >= 3) {
        String name = command.substring(7);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 0;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name
                    + " is no longer a member of staff");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    }[/code]

Read full topic
